text: Yih sun kar Sulemān bhaṛak uṭhā, “Adūniyāh kī Abīshāg se shādī!! Yih kaisī bāt hai jo āp pesh kar rahī haiṅ? Agar āp yih chāhtī haiṅ to kyoṅ na barāh-e-rāst taqāzā kareṅ ki Adūniyāh merī jagah taḳht par baiṭh jāe. Āḳhir wuh merā baṛā bhāī hai, aur Abiyātar Imām aur Yoāb bin Zarūyāh bhī us kā sāth de rahe haiṅ.”
